DOC.brief_summary: This efficacy safety study Vytorin ( ezetimibe ( + ) simvastatin ) compare atorvastatin ( ezetimibe/simvastatin ) week 6 primary hypercholesterolemia patient Korea . The primary hypothesis test daily administration Vytorin result great reduction low density lipoprotein cholesterol ( LDL-C ) concentration baseline 6 week treatment compare atorvastatin .
DOC.brief_title: Ezetimibe Plus ( + ) Simvastatin Versus Atorvastatin Comparative Study ( 0653A-092 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis hypercholesterolemia LDLC > /= 130 mg/dL < /=250 mg/dL triglyceride ( TG ) < /= 350 mg/dL National Cholesterol Education Program ( NCEP ) Adult Treatment Panel ( ATP ) III guideline Hypersensitivity 3hydroxy3methylglutarylCoA reductase ( HMGCoA reductase ) inhibitor Ezetimibe
